mapper.sql: SELECT A.CRS_CRE_CD , A.SBJ_CD , B.SBJ_NM , B.SBJ_CTGR_CD , C.SBJ_CTGR_NM , A.STUDY_MTHD , (SELECT FN_GET_CODE_NAME('STUDY_MTHD',A.STUDY_MTHD) ) AS STUDY_MTHD_NM , NVL((A.PRGR_RATIO),0) AS PRGR_RATIO , NVL((A.EXAM_RATIO),0) AS EXAM_RATIO , NVL((A.ASMT_RATIO),0) AS ASMT_RATIO , NVL((A.FORUM_RATIO),0) AS FORUM_RATIO , A.ETC_1_RATIO_NM , NVL((A.ETC_1_RATIO),0) AS ETC_1_RATIO , A.ETC_2_RATIO_NM , NVL((A.ETC_2_RATIO),0) AS ETC_2_RATIO , A.ETC_3_RATIO_NM , NVL((A.ETC_3_RATIO),0) AS ETC_3_RATIO , A.PLUS_SCORE_USE_YN , A.REG_NO , A.REG_DTTM , A.MOD_NO , A.MOD_DTTM , (SELECT FN_GET_USER_NAME(A.MOD_NO) FROM DUAL) AS MOD_NM , (SELECT FN_GET_USER_NAME(A.REG_NO) FROM DUAL) AS REG_NM , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_crs_sbj_cnts WHERE SBJ_CD = A.SBJ_CD AND UNIT_LVL = 1 ) AS CONTENTS_CNT FROM tb_crs_cre_crs_onln_sbj A, tb_crs_onln_sbj B, tb_crs_sbj_ctgr C WHERE A.SBJ_CD = B.SBJ_CD AND B.SBJ_CTGR_CD = C.SBJ_CTGR_CD AND A.CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd}
A.SBJ_CD , A.SBJ_NM , A.SBJ_CTGR_CD , B.SBJ_CTGR_NM , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_crs_sbj_cnts WHERE SBJ_CD = A.SBJ_CD ) AS CONTENTS_CNT

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_crs_cre_crs_onln_sbj ( CRS_CRE_CD , SBJ_CD , STUDY_MTHD , SBJ_ODR , PRGR_RATIO , EXAM_RATIO , ASMT_RATIO , FORUM_RATIO , ETC_1_RATIO_NM , ETC_1_RATIO , ETC_2_RATIO_NM , ETC_2_RATIO , ETC_3_RATIO_NM , ETC_3_RATIO , PLUS_SCORE_USE_YN , REG_NO , REG_DTTM , MOD_NO , MOD_DTTM ) SELECT #{crsCreCd} , #{sbjCd} , #{studyMthd} , NVL((MAX(SBJ_ODR)),0) + 1 , #{prgrRatio} , #{examRatio} , #{asmtRatio} , #{forumRatio} , #{etc1RatioNm} , #{etc1Ratio} , #{etc2RatioNm} , #{etc2Ratio} , #{etc3RatioNm} , #{etc3Ratio} , #{plusScoreUseYn} , #{regNo} , DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') , #{modNo} , DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') FROM tb_crs_cre_crs_onln_sbj WHERE CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd}

INSERT INTO tb_crs_cre_crs_onln_sbj ( CRS_CRE_CD , SBJ_CD , STUDY_MTHD , SBJ_ODR , PRGR_RATIO , EXAM_RATIO , ASMT_RATIO , FORUM_RATIO , ETC_1_RATIO_NM , ETC_1_RATIO , ETC_2_RATIO_NM , ETC_2_RATIO , ETC_3_RATIO_NM , ETC_3_RATIO , PLUS_SCORE_USE_YN , REG_NO , REG_DTTM , MOD_NO , MOD_DTTM ) SELECT #{crsCreCd} , SBJ_CD , STUDY_MTHD , SBJ_ODR , null , null , null , null , null , null , null , null , null , null , null , #{regNo} , DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') , #{modNo} , DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') FROM tb_crs_crs_onln_sbj WHERE CRS_CD = #{crsCd}
